statements: DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_source = 'malware' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE id = 1 AND feed_source = 'Source A'
DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM Indicators WHERE feed_id = 2 AND indicator_type = 'IP' AND indicator_value = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM malware WHERE malware_name = 'Ransomware' AND detection_date > '2021-01-01';
